decks.notes: This deck focuses on using efficient creatures and disruptive spells to apply early pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their game plan. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Snuff Out to disrupt the opponent's hand and creatures like Wight of the Reliquary and Scythecat Cub to apply pressure on the board, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Once Upon a Time to ensure consistency in finding the right threats at the right time. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to be a versatile and powerful force in the Legacy format.

The main concept of this deck is to create a combo using Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill through the opponent's deck and win the game. The deck utilizes cards like Goblin Engineer and Goblin Welder to tutor for and recur key pieces, while also including disruptive elements like Fury, Lightning Bolt, and Red Elemental Blast to control the game. The deck aims to assemble its combo quickly and efficiently, while using cards like Urza's Saga and Ancient Tomb to generate mana to fuel its strategy.
